I have 2 time experiences for this bus. I am feel worse for this bus. First time, i buy the ticket from Kulai to Tbs at 8pm. Unfortunately the bus accident happened but the PIC of bus inform to us wait another bus. This bus finally comes on 12pm-12.30pm. I have waited 5hours at bus stop! This years I said with me that give them 1 chance, but they still delay. I can accept causes of traffic jam. This bus came but we all waited 10 to 20 minutes for a late person. I donâ€™t why we need used our time to wait for one person?!  For the management part is really bad. I don't think I'll ever take this bus again.

1)delayed 1hours and 30 minutes. ticket departure time is 10.30am, so the bus should arrived before the time, but the bus arrived at 11.45am and departed at 12pm

2) the bus has no curtains, so is uncomfortable cuz the sunlight inside ,actually I didnâ€™t see any bus hasnt curtains beforeðŸ˜…

3) driver smoke when driving, ady affected our feeling and health

4)The reckless driver frequently steps on the accelerator and brakes urgently. this makes me dizzy and want to vomit.

5)when stop at Yong Peng for a pee, driver also can waste around 40 mins at there, every passengers ady boarded the bus, the driver is very terrible that I never seen before .

10am bus from tbs to johor jaya arrived at 4.32pm, fking experience

Worse bus ever!! Bought a ticket from Pasir Gudang at 725pm to Seremban but 1020 still havent enter highway! Make a few stops to fetch passengers, larkin, kulai and tunku aminah bus station. Driver so rude on the tamil radio out loud.
I take bus to avoid driving with lack of sleep but unfortunately taking bus doesn't help anything cus i cant sleep at all. Worse bus ever, first n last!

Today, we have lousy service and rude day time coach driver who ferried us from Genting. My aunt asked one of the driver is that the bus, he just showed his unhappy face and waved his hand.. when i asked one of the driver where are we having a meal, the driver just shout out YONG PENG.  When we reached toilet break, they also just shout unlike the night indian driver ao polite. Thw drivers talked loudly during the trip. We used to take this bus to and fro many times before covid. Now, bus won't drop us at the food area after leaving Genting so wondering there we going for lunch and gotten such reply. Will not take this bus next time. Night driver's are better and helpful. Polite and courteous. No wonder the review is bad. This will be our last ride with them.
